mapper.select: select qt.id, qt.checked, qt.info, qt.orderby, qt.title from t_item_question_type it left join d_questiontype qt on it.questiontype_id = qt.id where it.item_id = #{itemId}
select qt.id, qt.checked, qt.info, qt.orderby, qt.title from d_questiontype qt order by qt.orderby asc
